text: Young T & Bugsey are a British hip hop duo from Nottingham, consisting of rappers Ra’chard "Young T" Tucker and Doyin "Bugsey" Julius. They rose to prominence outside the UK due to the #DontRushChallenge, with their song "Don't Rush", where a group of people in a video compilation start off each part of their segment in their "home attire", then cover the camera with an object (usually a makeup brush for women or a beard brush for men) and reveal a glammed-up look after pulling the object away. ==Discography== ===Mixtapes=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of mixtapes, showing release date, label, and formats !
